text: Kevin Lawrence Skinner (24 November 1927 â€“ 21 July 2014) was a New Zealand rugby union player. He was born in Dunedin. He won 20 full caps for the All Blacks, two of them as captain. He was also a heavyweight boxer, winning the New Zealand championship in 1947. Skinner died in Auckland on 21 July 2014, aged 86. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:New Zealand boxers Category:New Zealand rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from Dunedin
title: Kevin Skinner (rugby union)
